Victoria Geyger

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Fred and Mary Katherine Barkmeier
  3. Location of Family: Exeter, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place:
  6. Age on Arrival: 3
  7. Date of Birth: 1898-05-07, New York City, NY
  8. Date of Death: 3/25/1993
  9. Gender: female
  10. Source: OTR 585 and p 59; E. Thomsen Corres.; OTR 80 info; A Profile of the Diocese of Lincoln from Toni Weiter's collection.
